fields.title: New Module Added!
fields.body: We've added a new case study to Module 2. Check it out and share your thoughts in the discussion forum!

fields.title: Reminder: Live Session Tomorrow!
fields.body: Don't forget our live Q&A session with Dr. Chen tomorrow at 2pm EST. Come prepared with your questions!

fields.title: Welcome to Medical Ethics 101!
fields.body: Welcome everyone! We're excited to have you in this course. Please complete Module 1 by the end of the week.

fields.title: DRAFT: End of Course Survey
fields.body: Please take our end-of-course survey to help us improve...
